Frequently Asked Questions

  • All
  • Getting Started
  • Pricing

How does the platform work?

The platform connects startups with potential investors. Startups create profiles showcasing their business, and investors browse these profiles to find opportunities that match their interests. The platform facilitates communication and potential investment deals between both parties.

How can I create a profile for my startup?

To create a profile, sign up for an account on our platform, and follow the prompts to enter information about your startup, including business details, market, team, and financials. Once completed, your profile will be visible to investors.

What information should I include in my startup profile?

What information should I include in my startup profile? Include comprehensive information about your business, such as your value proposition, market analysis, business model, team bios, financial projections, and any existing traction or milestones. This helps investors understand your potential.

How do investors find and contact startups on the platform?

Investors use search filters to find startups that match their investment criteria. They can view startup profiles and, if interested, contact the startup directly through the platform's messaging system.

What types of investors are on the platform (e.g., angel investors, venture capitalists)?

Our platform hosts a diverse range of investors, including angel investors, venture capitalists, corporate investors, and family offices. Each investor has unique criteria and interests, providing a wide array of funding opportunities for startups.

How can I improve my chances of attracting investment?

To improve your chances, ensure your profile is complete and professional, highlight your unique value proposition, demonstrate market demand and growth potential, provide solid financial projections, and actively engage with investors by responding promptly and professionally to inquiries. Networking and building relationships within the investor community also enhance your chances.
